Definition: Year of tree coordinates (x,y) or quadrat measurements
Numeric identifier of the 0.25 ha quadrat (NA if not recorded)
Latin name of the tree species (see below for code meaning)
x local coordinate of the tree (NA if tree is not mapped)
y local coordinate of the tree  (NA if tree is not mapped)
Elevation above a reference point. (x,y) local coordinates of the reference point can be found in the data_p.csv file
Year at which the tree reached a height of 1.3m determined from a core sample at 1.3 m height
